BARONY_ACH_5000_SECOND_RULE.name: 5000 Second Rule
BARONY_ACH_5000_SECOND_RULE.description: Pick up 50 detected food items as a Rat over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_ALL_IN_REFLEXES.name: It's All in the Reflexes
BARONY_ACH_ALL_IN_REFLEXES.description: Catch an Insectoid or Goatman's flying thrown weapon.

BARONY_ACH_ALWAYS_WAITING.name: ...Will Always Be Waiting
BARONY_ACH_ALWAYS_WAITING.description: Put an end to the Archmagisters' troubles.

BARONY_ACH_ANGEL_OF_DEATH.name: Angel of Death
BARONY_ACH_ANGEL_OF_DEATH.description: Perform a fatal stealth attack on an enemy that is attacking another player or allied NPC.

BARONY_ACH_ARCANE_LINK.name: Arcane Link
BARONY_ACH_ARCANE_LINK.description: Gain extra Mana Regeneration from two sources simultaneously.

BARONY_ACH_ARSENAL.name: Arsenal
BARONY_ACH_ARSENAL.description: Hold a crossbow, bow and all ammo types in your inventory at once as a Hunter

BARONY_ACH_BACK_TO_BASICS.name: Back to Basics
BARONY_ACH_BACK_TO_BASICS.description: Finish a Trial after you've encountered a lich

BARONY_ACH_BAD_BEAUTIFUL.name: Bad & Beautiful
BARONY_ACH_BAD_BEAUTIFUL.description: Equip 4 cursed items at once as a true Incubus or Succubus

BARONY_ACH_BAD_BLOOD.name: Bad Blood
BARONY_ACH_BAD_BLOOD.description: Lifesteal 500 HP from unarmed sneak-attack kills as an Accursed True Vampire.

BARONY_ACH_BAD_BOY_BARON.name: Bad Boy Baron
BARONY_ACH_BAD_BOY_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel as a true Incubus

BARONY_ACH_BAD_ROMANCE.name: Bad Romance
BARONY_ACH_BAD_ROMANCE.description: Recruit two incubi or succubi sumultaneously as a true Succubus.

BARONY_ACH_BAIT_AND_SWITCH.name: Bait and Switch
BARONY_ACH_BAIT_AND_SWITCH.description: Teleport while an enemy is attacking you in melee combat as a true Succubus.

BARONY_ACH_BARFIGHT_CHAMP.name: Barfight Champ
BARONY_ACH_BARFIGHT_CHAMP.description: Punch 50 enemies to death while drunk as a true Goatman.

BARONY_ACH_BAYOU_BARON.name: Bayou Baron
BARONY_ACH_BAYOU_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel as a true Goblin

BARONY_ACH_BLEATING_BARON.name: Bleating Baron
BARONY_ACH_BLEATING_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Goatman of any class.

BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_BOIL.name: Makes Your Blood Boil
BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_BOIL.description: Discover the effects of water as a true Vampire.

BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_IS_THE_LIFE.name: The Blood is the Life
BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_IS_THE_LIFE.description: Escape the Citadel as the Accursed class without being cured, and with hunger enabled.

BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_RUNS_CLEAR.name: Blood Runs Clear
BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_RUNS_CLEAR.description: Reach Legendary Stealth while playing as the Accursed class.

BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_SPORT.name: Blood Sport
BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_SPORT.description: Assassinate 50 targets while invisible as a true Vampire.

BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_VESSELS.name: Blood Vessels
BARONY_ACH_BLOOD_VESSELS.description: Accumulate 20 vials of blood at one time as a true Vampire.

BARONY_ACH_BODYGUARDS.name: Bodyguards
BARONY_ACH_BODYGUARDS.description: Have 2 Dominated Crystal Golems under your leadership.

BARONY_ACH_BOILERPLATE_BARON.name: Boilerplate Baron
BARONY_ACH_BOILERPLATE_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_BOMBSHELL_BARON.name: Bombshell Baron
BARONY_ACH_BOMBSHELL_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Succubus of any class.

BARONY_ACH_BOMBTRACK.name: Bombtrack
BARONY_ACH_BOMBTRACK.description: Have 5 bombs triggered by a single foe within 5 seconds

BARONY_ACH_BONE_TO_PICK.name: Bone to Pick
BARONY_ACH_BONE_TO_PICK.description: Have a summoned familiar reach level 35.

BARONY_ACH_BONY_BARON.name: Bony Baron
BARONY_ACH_BONY_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Skeleton of any class

BARONY_ACH_BOOKWORM.name: Bookworm
BARONY_ACH_BOOKWORM.description: Gain 50 Magic Levels from reading or casting from Spellbooks as a true Insectoid over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_BOOTS_OF_SPEED.name: Boots of Speed
BARONY_ACH_BOOTS_OF_SPEED.description: Defeat Baron Herx or Baphomet in 20 minutes or less.

BARONY_ACH_BORN_AGAIN.name: Born Again
BARONY_ACH_BORN_AGAIN.description: Survive instant death with an amulet of life saving.

BARONY_ACH_BOTTLE_NOSED.name: Bottle-Nosed
BARONY_ACH_BOTTLE_NOSED.description: Find extra potions from fountains 20 times as a true goatman.

BARONY_ACH_BRAWLER.name: Brawler
BARONY_ACH_BRAWLER.description: Attain victory in the Citadel by only attacking with your fists and throwing potions from the beginning of the game.

BARONY_ACH_BRING_A_TOWEL.name: Don't Forget to Bring a Towel!
BARONY_ACH_BRING_A_TOWEL.description: Use a towel to stop bleeding, clean pie off your face, and wipe grease from your hands.

BARONY_ACH_BUCKTOOTH_BARON.name: Bucktooth Baron
BARONY_ACH_BUCKTOOTH_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel playing as a true Vampire of any class.

BARONY_ACH_BUGGAR_BARON.name: Buggar Baron
BARONY_ACH_BUGGAR_BARON.description: Escape the Citadel as a true Insectoid

BARONY_ACH_BUT_A_SCRATCH.name: 'Tis But a Scratch!
BARONY_ACH_BUT_A_SCRATCH.description: Defeat a powerful enemy with no more than 5 hit points remaining.

BARONY_ACH_CALM_LIKE_A_BOMB.name: Calm Like a Bomb
BARONY_ACH_CALM_LIKE_A_BOMB.description: Throw a damaging bomb at a foe who was put to sleep by a sleep bomb

BARONY_ACH_CAUGHT_IN_A_MOSH.name: Caught in a Mosh
BARONY_ACH_CAUGHT_IN_A_MOSH.description: Have at least 4 sentries target the same monster at once

BARONY_ACH_CHEERS.name: Cheers!
BARONY_ACH_CHEERS.description: Throw booze at another character while you are under its effects

BARONY_ACH_CHOPPING_BLOCK.name: Chopping Block
BARONY_ACH_CHOPPING_BLOCK.description: Kill 50 enemies disabled by slow, sleep or paralyze effects with an axe as a Punisher over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_CHOSEN_ONE.name: You Were the Chosen One!
BARONY_ACH_CHOSEN_ONE.description: Die while equipped with a Legendary item.

BARONY_ACH_COCK_BLOCK.name: Cock Block
BARONY_ACH_COCK_BLOCK.description: Block and take no damage against a Cockatrice's melee attack.

BARONY_ACH_COLD_BLOODED.name: Cold Blooded
BARONY_ACH_COLD_BLOODED.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a true Vampire and an Insectoid are in the party

BARONY_ACH_COMEDIAN.name: Comedian
BARONY_ACH_COMEDIAN.description: Equip Funny Bones' weapon and cloak with no other equipment as a skeleton.

BARONY_ACH_COMMANDER_CHIEF.name: Commander in Chief
BARONY_ACH_COMMANDER_CHIEF.description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Mesmer class of any race.

BARONY_ACH_CONFESSOR.name: Confessor
BARONY_ACH_CONFESSOR.description: Dominate an NPC that is already allied to you.

BARONY_ACH_COWBOY_FROM_HELL.name: Cowboy From Hell
BARONY_ACH_COWBOY_FROM_HELL.description: Kill 50 enemies with the whip shortly after teleporting them over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_DIPLOMA.name: Diploma
BARONY_ACH_DIPLOMA.description: Complete all Trials in the Hall of Trials

BARONY_ACH_DRUNK_POWER.name: Drunk with Power
BARONY_ACH_DRUNK_POWER.description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Brewer class of any race.

BARONY_ACH_DYSLEXIA.name: Dyslexia
BARONY_ACH_DYSLEXIA.description: Burn 50 spellbooks to ash as a Goblin across multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_EARN_THIS.name: Earn This
BARONY_ACH_EARN_THIS.description: Give a Legendary item to an Allied NPC.

BARONY_ACH_ENTER_THE_DUNGEON.name: Enter the Dungeon
BARONY_ACH_ENTER_THE_DUNGEON.description: Descend to level 1 of the dungeon.

BARONY_ACH_ESCORT.name: Escort
BARONY_ACH_ESCORT.description: Return to Hamlet with a human NPC ally.

BARONY_ACH_EXPELLED.name: Expelled
BARONY_ACH_EXPELLED.description: Die in the Hall of Trials hub

BARONY_ACH_EXTERNAL_BATTERY.name: External Battery
BARONY_ACH_EXTERNAL_BATTERY.description: Relinquish the soul of a summoned familiar while you have zero MP.

BARONY_ACH_EXTRA_CREDIT.name: Extra Credit
BARONY_ACH_EXTRA_CREDIT.description: Find a secret area in each of the 10 Trials in the Hall of Trials

BARONY_ACH_FACES_OF_DEATH.name: Faces of Death
BARONY_ACH_FACES_OF_DEATH.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a Shaman and Conjurer are in the party

BARONY_ACH_FAMILY_REUNION.name: Family Reunion
BARONY_ACH_FAMILY_REUNION.description: Recruit three goatman allies as a true goatman.

BARONY_ACH_FASCIST.name: Fascist
BARONY_ACH_FASCIST.description: Consume 50 non-magical book or scrolls as a true Automaton over the course of multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_FAST_LEARNER.name: Fast Learner
BARONY_ACH_FAST_LEARNER.description: Complete the all Trials with a combined completion time of less than 20 minutes

BARONY_ACH_FELL_BEAST.name: Fell Beast
BARONY_ACH_FELL_BEAST.description: Do a very large amount of damage to an enemy using a ranged weapon with a single shot

BARONY_ACH_FIXER_UPPER.name: Fixer-Upper
BARONY_ACH_FIXER_UPPER.description: Repair or Salvage 100 Tinkered traps and machine allies

BARONY_ACH_FLUTTERSHY.name: Flutter Shy
BARONY_ACH_FLUTTERSHY.description: Gain access to an otherwise inaccessible area of the level by using Flutter

BARONY_ACH_FOODLESS_CONDUCT.name: Foodless Conduct
BARONY_ACH_FOODLESS_CONDUCT.description: Win the game without eating any food.

BARONY_ACH_FORUM_TROLL.name: Forum Troll
BARONY_ACH_FORUM_TROLL.description: Acquire 3 Troll allies, break 3 walls, and cast Fear on 3 characters as a Troll in a single playthrough

BARONY_ACH_FREE_REFILLS.name: Free Refills
BARONY_ACH_FREE_REFILLS.description: Fill 50 empty bottles from sinks or fountains.

BARONY_ACH_FUNCTIONAL.name: Functional
BARONY_ACH_FUNCTIONAL.description: Cure your hangover 10 times in a single playthrough as a true Goatman.

BARONY_ACH_GASTRIC_BYPASS.name: Gastric Bypass
BARONY_ACH_GASTRIC_BYPASS.description: Kill an enemy with a spell that leaves you with 5 or fewer Energy as a true Insectoid

BARONY_ACH_GIFTS_ETERNALS.name: Gifts From the Eternals
BARONY_ACH_GIFTS_ETERNALS.description: Obtain and wear a full set of Artifact Armor.

BARONY_ACH_GOODNIGHT_SWEET_PRINCE.name: Goodnight Sweet Prince
BARONY_ACH_GOODNIGHT_SWEET_PRINCE.description: Watch your Gyrobot get smashed by a boulder

BARONY_ACH_GUDIPARIAN_BAZI.name: Gudiparan Bazi
BARONY_ACH_GUDIPARIAN_BAZI.description: Escape the Citadel without ever hitting an enemy with a melee weapon as a Hunter from the beginning of the game

BARONY_ACH_GUERILLA_RADIO.name: Guerilla Radio
BARONY_ACH_GUERILLA_RADIO.description: Kill 20 enemies who are being drawn towards a Noisemaker

BARONY_ACH_HARDCORE.name: Classical Hardcore
BARONY_ACH_HARDCORE.description: Finish the game from beginning to end with Classic and Hardcore modes on.

BARONY_ACH_HEAL_BOT.name: Heal Bot
BARONY_ACH_HEAL_BOT.description: Heal 1000 points of Player or Allied NPC hit points in a single playthrough.

BARONY_ACH_HOMICIDAL_MANIAC.name: Homicidal Maniac
BARONY_ACH_HOMICIDAL_MANIAC.description: Kill at least 10 humans in a single game.

BARONY_ACH_HOT_SHOWER.name: Hot Shower
BARONY_ACH_HOT_SHOWER.description: Use a sink or fountain to extinguish flames.

BARONY_ACH_HOT_TUB.name: Hot Tub Time Machine
BARONY_ACH_HOT_TUB.description: Gain 50+ Levels of Swimming with Hunger turned off.

BARONY_ACH_IF_YOU_LOVE_SOMETHING.name: If You Love Something
BARONY_ACH_IF_YOU_LOVE_SOMETHING.description: Have the Boomerang return to you 100 times after hitting an enemy over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_ILLITERATE_CONDUCT.name: Illiterate Conduct
BARONY_ACH_ILLITERATE_CONDUCT.description: Win the game without having read any books, scrolls, or spellbooks.

BARONY_ACH_IN_GREATER_NUMBERS.name: In Greater Numbers
BARONY_ACH_IN_GREATER_NUMBERS.description: Win the game with at least two players alive.

BARONY_ACH_IRONIC_PUNISHMENT.name: Ironic Punishment Division
BARONY_ACH_IRONIC_PUNISHMENT.description: Use the whip to disarm a target's melee weapon, pick up the weapon, and use it to kill the same target

BARONY_ACH_IRON_GUT.name: Iron Gut
BARONY_ACH_IRON_GUT.description: Eat 20 tin cans as a true goatman.

BARONY_ACH_ITS_A_LIVING.name: It's a Living
BARONY_ACH_ITS_A_LIVING.description: Inflict bleeding status on 50 enemies while wearing the executioner's hood over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_I_WANT_IT_ALL.name: I Want it All
BARONY_ACH_I_WANT_IT_ALL.description: Play as every DLC class and race

BARONY_ACH_KILL_COMMAND.name: Kill Command
BARONY_ACH_KILL_COMMAND.description: Have your charmed allies kill 50 enemies.

BARONY_ACH_KING_ARTHURS_BLADE.name: King Arthur's Blade
BARONY_ACH_KING_ARTHURS_BLADE.description: Find King Arthur's mystical sword, Dyrnwyn.

BARONY_ACH_KNOW_THYSELF.name: Know Thyself
BARONY_ACH_KNOW_THYSELF.description: Kill a Shadow who is mimicking your identity.

BARONY_ACH_LAST_RESORT.name: Last Resort
BARONY_ACH_LAST_RESORT.description: Destroy a boulder using a pickaxe while it's rolling toward you.

BARONY_ACH_LEVITANT_LACKEY.name: Levitant Lackey
BARONY_ACH_LEVITANT_LACKEY.description: Command a Gyrobot to grab an item or interact with a switch that is otherwise inaccessible

BARONY_ACH_LICH_HUNTER.name: Lich Hunter
BARONY_ACH_LICH_HUNTER.description: Find and defeat Baron Herx in his lair.

BARONY_ACH_LIFE_FOR_A_LIFE.name: A Life for a Life
BARONY_ACH_LIFE_FOR_A_LIFE.description: Sacrifice your entire health pool to Dominate an enemy and survive it.

BARONY_ACH_LIKE_CLOCKWORK.name: Like Clockwork
BARONY_ACH_LIKE_CLOCKWORK.description: Escape the Citadel as a Mechanist of any race

BARONY_ACH_LOCAL_CUSTOMS.name: Local Customs
BARONY_ACH_LOCAL_CUSTOMS.description: Start a game with a local mod file loaded

BARONY_ACH_MACHINE_HEAD.name: Machine Head
BARONY_ACH_MACHINE_HEAD.description: Have a crossbow sentry, magic sentry and gyrocopter all active at once

BARONY_ACH_MANAGEMENT_TEAM.name: Management Team
BARONY_ACH_MANAGEMENT_TEAM.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a Mechanist and a Mesmer are in the party

BARONY_ACH_MANY_PEDI_PALP.name: Many-Pedi-Palp
BARONY_ACH_MANY_PEDI_PALP.description: Kill 50 webbed enemies as a Spider over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_MASTER.name: Master
BARONY_ACH_MASTER.description: Find the Master's Wing in the Hall of Trials hub

BARONY_ACH_MIXOLOGIST.name: Master Mixologist
BARONY_ACH_MIXOLOGIST.description: Learn all of the base and secondary alchemy ingredients.

BARONY_ACH_MONARCH.name: Monarch
BARONY_ACH_MONARCH.description: Have Insectoid allies kill 20 enemies for you

BARONY_ACH_MONSTER_SQUAD.name: Monster Squad
BARONY_ACH_MONSTER_SQUAD.description: Play a game with 3 or more players where everyone is a monster.

BARONY_ACH_MOVED_ITSELF.name: That boulder moved itself!
BARONY_ACH_MOVED_ITSELF.description: Kill an ally player with a pushed boulder.

BARONY_ACH_MUSCLE_MEMORY.name: Muscle Memory
BARONY_ACH_MUSCLE_MEMORY.description: Eat food when polymorphed into a human as a true Skeleton.

BARONY_ACH_MY_FINAL_FORM.name: My Final Form
BARONY_ACH_MY_FINAL_FORM.description: Escape the Citadel as a Shaman of any race

BARONY_ACH_NARCISSIST.name: Narcissist
BARONY_ACH_NARCISSIST.description: Use a Mirror Shield to kill an enemy using its own reflected spell.

BARONY_ACH_NATURAL_BORN_LEADER.name: Natural Born Leader
BARONY_ACH_NATURAL_BORN_LEADER.description: Convince at least three NPCs to follow you at once.

BARONY_ACH_OFF_LIMITS.name: Off Limits
BARONY_ACH_OFF_LIMITS.description: Attempt to charm a monster that cannot be tamed.

BARONY_ACH_OHAI_MARK.name: OHAI MARK
BARONY_ACH_OHAI_MARK.description: Teleport to and assassinate 20 marked enemies in a single playthrough

BARONY_ACH_ONE_MANS_TRASH.name: One Man's Trash
BARONY_ACH_ONE_MANS_TRASH.description: Use a Cursed Magicstaff until it breaks.

BARONY_ACH_ONE_PUNCH_MAN.name: One Punch Man
BARONY_ACH_ONE_PUNCH_MAN.description: Paralyze a monster with Legendary Unarmed skill.

BARONY_ACH_ONE_WHO_KNOCKS.name: I Am the One Who Knocks
BARONY_ACH_ONE_WHO_KNOCKS.description: Tank a minotaur's attack and take no damage from it without blocking.

BARONY_ACH_OVERCLOCKED.name: Overclocked
BARONY_ACH_OVERCLOCKED.description: Accumulate 10 minutes of playtime with a superheated boiler as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_OWN_WORST_ENEMY.name: Your Own Worst Enemy
BARONY_ACH_OWN_WORST_ENEMY.description: Get a lich killed by its own summoned minion.

BARONY_ACH_PENNILESS_CONDUCT.name: Penniless Conduct
BARONY_ACH_PENNILESS_CONDUCT.description: Win the game without collecting any gold.

BARONY_ACH_PIMPIN.name: Pimpin Ain't Easy
BARONY_ACH_PIMPIN.description: Recruit a total of 6 Succubus, Incubus or Humans as a true Incubus or Succubus

BARONY_ACH_PITY_FRIEND.name: Pity Friend
BARONY_ACH_PITY_FRIEND.description: Recruit a human ally as a monster.

BARONY_ACH_PLEASE_HOLD.name: Please Hold
BARONY_ACH_PLEASE_HOLD.description: Hit an enemy with Hunting or Fire Ammo, and then stall them with Springshot Ammo

BARONY_ACH_PLUS_BOOTS_OF_SPEED.name: Blessed Boots of Speed
BARONY_ACH_PLUS_BOOTS_OF_SPEED.description: Reach the final stage in 45 minutes or less and win the game.

BARONY_ACH_POP_QUIZ.name: Pop Quiz
BARONY_ACH_POP_QUIZ.description: Cast 20 different spells from spellbooks as a true Goblin in a single playthrough

BARONY_ACH_POST_HARDCORE.name: Postmodern Hardcore
BARONY_ACH_POST_HARDCORE.description: Finish the game from beginning to end with Hardcore mode on and Classic Mode off.

BARONY_ACH_POTION_PREPARATION.name: Potion Preparation
BARONY_ACH_POTION_PREPARATION.description: Hold 16 different potions or bottled liquids in your inventory that don't need to be brewed first.

BARONY_ACH_POWER_HUNGRY.name: Power Hungry
BARONY_ACH_POWER_HUNGRY.description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Accursed class of any race.

BARONY_ACH_PROFESSIONAL_BURGLAR.name: Professional Burglar
BARONY_ACH_PROFESSIONAL_BURGLAR.description: Kill at least 3 shopkeepers in one game.

BARONY_ACH_RAGE_AGAINST.name: Rage Against the Machine
BARONY_ACH_RAGE_AGAINST.description: Kill 20 enemies while they are attacking Dummybots over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_RANGER_DANGER.name: Ranger Danger
BARONY_ACH_RANGER_DANGER.description: Escape the Citadel as a Hunter of any race

BARONY_ACH_REAL_BOY.name: I'm a Real Boy
BARONY_ACH_REAL_BOY.description: Recruit a Human ally and shop with a merchant while under the effects of polymorph as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_RECYCLER.name: Recycler
BARONY_ACH_RECYCLER.description: Give an item to an Allied Automaton to recycle.

BARONY_ACH_REPOSSESSION.name: Repossession
BARONY_ACH_REPOSSESSION.description: Pick up an item that an Incubus or Succubus stole from you.

BARONY_ACH_REUNITED.name: Reunited
BARONY_ACH_REUNITED.description: Kill a Minotaur after encountering Herx.

BARONY_ACH_REVERSE_THIS_CURSE.name: Reverse This Curse
BARONY_ACH_REVERSE_THIS_CURSE.description: Find a cure for the Accursed class.

BARONY_ACH_RHINESTONE_COWBOY.name: Rhinestone Cowboy
BARONY_ACH_RHINESTONE_COWBOY.description: Identify 50 pieces of Worthless Glass throughout multiple playthroughs.

BARONY_ACH_RHYTHM_OF_THE_KNIGHT.name: The Rhythm of the Knight
BARONY_ACH_RHYTHM_OF_THE_KNIGHT.description: Perform a Block, Attack tradeoff 3 times against a single foe without taking an unblocked hit.

BARONY_ACH_RICH_ALTER_EGO.name: My Rich Alter-Ego
BARONY_ACH_RICH_ALTER_EGO.description: As a monster, trade 50,000 gold while under the effects of Polymorph across all your games.

BARONY_ACH_RIGHT_TO_REFUSE.name: Right to Refuse
BARONY_ACH_RIGHT_TO_REFUSE.description: Get chased out of a shop because you're a monster.

BARONY_ACH_ROBBING_THE_CRADLE.name: Robbing the Cradle
BARONY_ACH_ROBBING_THE_CRADLE.description: Loot the Haunted Castle and escape with your life.

BARONY_ACH_ROLL_THE_BONES.name: Roll The Bones
BARONY_ACH_ROLL_THE_BONES.description: Enscribe 50 scrolls with the Magic Quill as a Shaman over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_RUST_IN_PEACE.name: Rust In Peace
BARONY_ACH_RUST_IN_PEACE.description: Die from the effects of having a cold boiler as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_SAVAGE.name: Savage
BARONY_ACH_SAVAGE.description: Reach Legendary skill in any melee weapon skill as a true Goblin

BARONY_ACH_SECOND_CHANCE.name: Second Chance
BARONY_ACH_SECOND_CHANCE.description: Revive yourself by expending your mana as a skeleton.

BARONY_ACH_SECRET_WEAPON.name: Secret Weapon
BARONY_ACH_SECRET_WEAPON.description: Kill a lich with a thrown potion.

BARONY_ACH_SEE_THAT.name: Did You See That?!
BARONY_ACH_SEE_THAT.description: Kill a monster with a shuriken after it has twice bounced off a wall.

BARONY_ACH_SELF_FLAGELLATION.name: Self Flagellation
BARONY_ACH_SELF_FLAGELLATION.description: Have 30 Enemies kill themselves under retaliation from an Inner Demon over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_SERIAL_THRILLA.name: Serial Thrilla
BARONY_ACH_SERIAL_THRILLA.description: Gain 100 mana from Amulets of Strangulation as a true Incubus or Succubus

BARONY_ACH_SITTING_DUCK.name: Sitting Duck
BARONY_ACH_SITTING_DUCK.description: Kill 10 enemies while they are paralyzed or ensnared in a single playthrough.

BARONY_ACH_SKELETON_CREW.name: Skeleton Crew
BARONY_ACH_SKELETON_CREW.description: Summon two Skeleton Familiars at once.

BARONY_ACH_SOCIAL_BUTTERFLY.name: Social Butterfly
BARONY_ACH_SOCIAL_BUTTERFLY.description: Recruit 50 allies while Shapeshifted or Polymorphed as a Shaman over multiple playthroughs

BARONY_ACH_SOCIOPATHS.name: Sociopaths
BARONY_ACH_SOCIOPATHS.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where an Accursed and a Punisher are in the party

BARONY_ACH_SOULLESS.name: Soulless
BARONY_ACH_SOULLESS.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a true Automaton and Skeleton are in the party

BARONY_ACH_SPICE_OF_LIFE.name: Spice of Life
BARONY_ACH_SPICE_OF_LIFE.description: Start at least one game with every class.

BARONY_ACH_SPICY.name: Spicy!
BARONY_ACH_SPICY.description: Consume 10 Scrolls of Fire as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_SPONGE.name: Sponge
BARONY_ACH_SPONGE.description: Survive 150 damage or more taken from a single attack.

BARONY_ACH_SPUD_LORD.name: Spud Lord
BARONY_ACH_SPUD_LORD.description: Find the mystical talking mace, Sharur.

BARONY_ACH_SQUAD_GHOULS.name: Squad Ghouls
BARONY_ACH_SQUAD_GHOULS.description: Recruit four ghouls at once as a skeleton.

BARONY_ACH_STROBE.name: Let There Be Strobe
BARONY_ACH_STROBE.description: Exploit the Light spell by casting it 20 times in a single minute.

BARONY_ACH_STRUNG_OUT.name: Strung Out
BARONY_ACH_STRUNG_OUT.description: Use swift ammunition while wielding the compound bow to score 10 hits on enemies in a short amount of time

BARONY_ACH_STUCK_ON_YOU.name: Stuck On You
BARONY_ACH_STUCK_ON_YOU.description: Have a fountain bless your equipment as a true Succubus.

BARONY_ACH_SUPER_SHREDDER.name: Super Shredder
BARONY_ACH_SUPER_SHREDDER.description: Recycle items into 1000 units of Scrap and Essence using Tinkering Toolkits

BARONY_ACH_SURROGATES.name: Surrogates
BARONY_ACH_SURROGATES.description: Allow 50 charmed allies to die in while in your service as a Mesmer.

BARONY_ACH_SURVIVALISTS.name: Survivalists
BARONY_ACH_SURVIVALISTS.description: Escape the Mines in cooperative game where a Hunter and Brewer are in the party

BARONY_ACH_SWINGERS.name: Swingers
BARONY_ACH_SWINGERS.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a true Incubus and Succubus are in the party

BARONY_ACH_TAKING_WITH.name: I'm Taking You With Me
BARONY_ACH_TAKING_WITH.description: Kill an enemy after you are dead using poison, fire, or thrown tinkered traps

BARONY_ACH_TEACHABLE_MOMENT.name: Teachable Moment
BARONY_ACH_TEACHABLE_MOMENT.description: Die during any Trial in the Hall of Trials

BARONY_ACH_TELEFRAG.name: Telefrag
BARONY_ACH_TELEFRAG.description: Kill an enemy within 1 second of it teleporting

BARONY_ACH_TEMPTRESS.name: Temptress
BARONY_ACH_TEMPTRESS.description: Recruit a confused or drunk human as a true Succubus.

BARONY_ACH_THANK_ME_LATER.name: You'll Thank Me Later
BARONY_ACH_THANK_ME_LATER.description: Throw a Healing or Extra Healing potion at another Player or allied NPC.

BARONY_ACH_THANK_THE_TANK.name: Thank the Tank
BARONY_ACH_THANK_THE_TANK.description: Have an allied player or NPC kill an enemy that you are Blocking.

BARONY_ACH_THE_WAY_YOU_LIKE_IT.name: The Way You Like It
BARONY_ACH_THE_WAY_YOU_LIKE_IT.description: Curse a blessed weapon as a true Succubus.

BARONY_ACH_THICK_SKULL.name: Thick Skull
BARONY_ACH_THICK_SKULL.description: Kill a Scarab using a magic spell.

BARONY_ACH_TIME_TO_PLAN.name: Given Enough Time to Plan
BARONY_ACH_TIME_TO_PLAN.description: Achieve the killing blow against a minotaur using machines and / or traps

BARONY_ACH_TIME_TO_SUFFER.name: Time to Suffer
BARONY_ACH_TIME_TO_SUFFER.description: Escape the Citadel as a Punisher of any race

BARONY_ACH_TOUGH_AS_NAILS.name: Tough as Nails
BARONY_ACH_TOUGH_AS_NAILS.description: Have 50 enemies break their weapons against you throughout multiple playthroughs.

BARONY_ACH_TRADITION.name: It's Tradition
BARONY_ACH_TRADITION.description: Kill 20 enemies that are near a fountain as a true Incubus

BARONY_ACH_TRASH_COMPACTOR.name: Trash Compactor
BARONY_ACH_TRASH_COMPACTOR.description: Consume 100 scrap as a true Automaton

BARONY_ACH_TRIBAL.name: Tribal
BARONY_ACH_TRIBAL.description: Escape the Mines in a cooperative game where a true Goatman and Goblin are in the party

BARONY_ACH_TRIBE_SUBSCRIBE.name: Tribe & Subscribe
BARONY_ACH_TRIBE_SUBSCRIBE.description: Recruit 4 Goblins as a true Goblin

BARONY_ACH_TRICKS_AND_TRAPS.name: Tricks and Traps
BARONY_ACH_TRICKS_AND_TRAPS.description: Discover the trap-infested Temple in the swamp.

BARONY_ACH_TROLLS_BLOOD.name: Troll's Blood
BARONY_ACH_TROLLS_BLOOD.description: Gain extra Health Regeneration from two sources simultaneously.

BARONY_ACH_TURN_UNDEAD.name: Turn Undead
BARONY_ACH_TURN_UNDEAD.description: Escape the Citadel playing as the Conjurer class of any race.

BARONY_ACH_UNSTOPPABLE_FORCE.name: Unstoppable Force
BARONY_ACH_UNSTOPPABLE_FORCE.description: Break 50 pieces of enemy armor throughout multiple playthroughs.

BARONY_ACH_UTILITY_BELT.name: Utility Belt
BARONY_ACH_UTILITY_BELT.description: Have one of every crafted Tinkering item in your inventory

BARONY_ACH_VEGETARIAN_CONDUCT.name: Vegetarian Conduct
BARONY_ACH_VEGETARIAN_CONDUCT.description: Win the game without having eaten any tins, meat, or fish.

BARONY_ACH_VOLATILE.name: Volatile
BARONY_ACH_VOLATILE.description: Damage multiple enemies with a single brewed unstable potion 20 times.

BARONY_ACH_WELL_PREPARED.name: Well Prepared
BARONY_ACH_WELL_PREPARED.description: Have 3 Mystic Orb effects active simultaneously.

BARONY_ACH_WELL_READ.name: Well Read
BARONY_ACH_WELL_READ.description: Find and read all of the books.

BARONY_ACH_WHAT_NOW.name: Uh... What Now?
BARONY_ACH_WHAT_NOW.description: Break your Magicstaff of Charm while you don't know the Charm spell as a Mesmer.

BARONY_ACH_WONDERFUL_TOYS.name: Wonderful Toys
BARONY_ACH_WONDERFUL_TOYS.description: Use a Teleport Trap to send yourself to a part of the level that is otherwise inaccessible

BARONY_ACH_YES_WE_CAN.name: Yes We Can!
BARONY_ACH_YES_WE_CAN.description: Eat 10 tins of food in a single playthrough.

BARONY_ACH_YOUNG_BLOOD.name: Youngblood
BARONY_ACH_YOUNG_BLOOD.description: Recruit a Young Vampire as a vampire.
